entry.title: ​​Nexo To Acquire Competing Crypto Lender Vauld
entry.summary: “We've signed an indicative term sheet with Nexo to acquire up to 100% of Vauld,” co-founder Darshan Bathija tweeted early Tuesday.

entry.summary: Proposal Would Advance Push into Real World Assets

entry.title: SushiSwap Votes to Let Traders Offset Carbon Emissions
entry.summary: DEX Joins Forces with Polygon and KlimaDAO in Climate Change Move

entry.title: Survivors of 2018-20 Crypto Winter Show the Way Through New Bear Market

entry.title: 3AC Liquidation, Celsius Layoffs, Voyager Freezes but BlockFi Strikes a Deal
entry.summary: Is it over? Is this the future? Sadly, the answer, is no. The catastrophic fallout of the UST collapse continues as Voyager, Celsius, BlockFi, 3AC and SBF dominated headlines once again last week. All the latest from this opera of rektitude.
